languages.text: Джай Хейдари предлагает Вольному Торговцу устроить небольшое празднование в убежище в честь воссоединения их небольшого отряда.
Jae Heydari thinks the Rogue Trader should throw a little celebration at the hideout to mark the reunion of their small squad.
languages.original_text: Джай Хейдари предлагает Вольному Торговцу устроить небольшое празднование в убежище в честь воссоединения их небольшого отряда.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari thinks the Rogue Trader should throw a little celebration at the hideout to mark the reunion of their small squad.

languages.text: Jae Heydari ist der Ansicht, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} im Versteck ein kleines Fest geben sollte, um die Wiedervereinigung ihres kleinen Trupps zu feiern.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari thinks the Rogue Trader should throw a little celebration at the hideout to mark the reunion of their small squad.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari ist der Ansicht, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} im Versteck ein kleines Fest geben sollte, um die Wiedervereinigung ihres kleinen Trupps zu feiern.

languages.text: Jae Heydari pense que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} devrait organiser une sauterie à la cachette pour fêter les retrouvailles de leur petit groupe.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari thinks the Rogue Trader should throw a little celebration at the hideout to mark the reunion of their small squad.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari pense que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} devrait organiser une sauterie à la cachette pour fêter les retrouvailles de leur petit groupe.

languages.text: Jae Heydari cree que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente debería organizar una pequeña celebración en el escondite para festejar la reunión del grupo.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari thinks the Rogue Trader should throw a little celebration at the hideout to mark the reunion of their small squad.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari cree que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente debería organizar una pequeña celebración en el escondite para festejar la reunión del grupo.

languages.text: 婕伊·海达利认为行商浪人应当在他们的藏身地举行小小的庆祝活动，纪念他们小小的队伍再次团聚。
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari thinks the Rogue Trader should throw a little celebration at the hideout to mark the reunion of their small squad.

traits.locale_text: 婕伊·海达利认为行商浪人应当在他们的藏身地举行小小的庆祝活动，纪念他们小小的队伍再次团聚。

languages.text: ジェイ・ヘイダリは、隠れ家でちょっとした祝宴を設けて、仲間との再会を自由開拓者に祝って欲しいと考えている。
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari thinks the Rogue Trader should throw a little celebration at the hideout to mark the reunion of their small squad.

traits.locale_text: ジェイ・ヘイダリは、隠れ家でちょっとした祝宴を設けて、仲間との再会を自由開拓者に祝って欲しいと考えている。

languages.text: Jae Heydari, Hür Tacir'in ufak mangalarının yeniden bir araya gelişini kutlamak için sığınakta bir buluşma düzenlemesi gerektiğini düşünüyor.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari thinks the Rogue Trader should throw a little celebration at the hideout to mark the reunion of their small squad.
